column1: #Text=Chit Sang says : " Took you guys long enough .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Are you sure you wan na go ?
#Text=You 're the one who said you wanted to redeem yourself .
#Text=" Sokka says : " If I had just cut my losses at the invasion , maybe we would n't be in this mess .
#Text=Maybe sometimes it 's just better to call it quits before you fail .
#Text=Look Sokka , you 're going to fail a lot before things work out .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That supposed to make me feel better ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Even though you 'll probably fail over and over and over again ... " Sokka says : " Seriously , not helping .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You have to try every time .
#Text=You ca n't quit because you 're afraid you might fail .
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Hey , if you two are done cuddling , can we get a move on ?
#Text=" Suki says : " I 'm not leaving without you , Sokka .
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Not me , I 'm out .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We gave up our only chance of escaping .
#Text=I hope we have n't just made a huge mistake .
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Aah , this current is so slow .
#Text=Secure the perimeter and lock down the prisoners !
